Jack Wrigley

Jack Wrigley was born in 1991 and grew up in Shropshire. He went to Secondary School with Angus where he gained a keen interest in art. An accomplished sportsman Jack’s friendship with Angus flourished based on their competitiveness with each other. Jack went on to pursue a five year joint honours degree at Edinburgh University reading History of Art and Fine Art. When he wasn’t painting, sculpting, or playing the piano Jack has been busy filming documentaries with Angus. Planning the adventures in Mongolia and Lake Malawi also nurtured an interest in anthropology. Jack hopes in the future to combine all these interests with a career as a documentary broadcaster.
